name: Farsi Bible Verse of the day
author: Farsi Bible Verse of the day

sections.description:
This plugins shows a Farsi Bible verse of the Day, or a Random Farsi Bible verse.

It can be used as a widget, so it’s easy to install. After installing the plugin you will have two widgets: ‘آیه امروز’ and ‘آیه کنونی’.

You can also use the following tags: [farsiverseoftheday] and [farsirandomverse].
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. You can install the plugin by uploading the zip in the plugins section of wordpress, or by adding the files to the folder ‘/wp-content/plugins/farsi-verse-of-the-day’.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
    • Widget: There are widgets added ‘آیه امروز’ and ‘آیه کنونی’, you can drag them onto the sidebar of your site.
    • Replace tags: You can use the following shortcodes: [farsiverseoftheday] and [farsirandomverse].
    • Template: Place <?php echo farsi_verse_of_the_day(0); ?>to show a farsi bible verse of the day or <?php echo farsiverseoftheday_random_verse(0); ?>to show a random farsi bible in your template. to show both fonction you can add both tags.
